entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
